title: Loot seems awkward.
body: Loot seems a little out of place in that top bar. Maybe have a smaller squarebox for hextech stuff? Maybe crafting?

replies.body: the mastery tokens to me have the unnecessary borders on it. just imo

I agree that it seems awkward but not for the placement on the hot bar. I think the size of it looks strange. All the icons take up less than half the screen with the other side for flashy animations. The icon's are unnaturally small.
I personally like where [loot] is in the alpha. It is between [profile] and [store] in the formal client, and so is it in the alpha. It makes sense. :3
